com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Class Line

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.geom.Line2D
        |
        +--java.awt.geom.Line2D.Double
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Curve, Geometry, Segment, Shape
public class Line
extends Line2D.Double
implements Segment

This class implements a straight line connecting 2 Points. It is implemented as a subclass to Java2D Line2D class in order to provide performance.

getEnvelope

public final Envelope getEnvelope(Envelope e)
Description copied from interface: Geometry
Determines the bounding box of the geometry. If an envelope is used as the argument, its value will be updated and returned. If null is used as the argument, a new envelope will be returned.
